Package controller

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AudioController
    The Audio Controller Class is responsible for setting audio at various points in the game.
    BallController
    The BallController abstract class provides a template that allows different types of Balls to be created.
    BrickController
    The BrickController abstract class provides a template that allows different types of Bricks to be created.
    CrackController
    Crack Controller is responsible for providing the Bricks the 'Crack' Feature.
    DebugPanelController
    DebugPanelController Class extends JDialog and implements WindowListener.It is responsible for the functionality the Debug Panel.
    GameBoardController
    GameBoardView Class extends JComponent and implements KeyListener , MouseListener and MouseMotionListener to generate the GameBoard Functionality.
    HighScoreController
    HighScoreController is responsible the Score Functionality.
    PauseMenuController
    PauseMenuController is responsible for the PauseMenu Functionality in the GameBoard.
    PlayerController
    The PlayerController class is responsible for defining the Player's functionality.
    TimerController
    TimerController is responsible for controlling the timer functionality in the game
    WallController
    Responsible for implementing the Wall Functionality in the Game, with it's interaction with the ball, brick, player and the wall.
